title: CHAPTER I: The Return of a Prodigal.

book.title: Bonnie Prince Charlie
book.description: 简介： It was a dull evening in the month of September, 1728. The apprentices had closed and barred the shutters and the day's work was over. Supper was laid in the long room over the shop, the viands were on the table, and round it were standing Bailie And...
